constraints.name: sum_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素的和必须能够被给定的整数 D 整除

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 从每个子区间 [l, r] 中选择一个子集，使得该子集满足特定条件
constraints.formal: ∀ i ∈ [1, M], ∃ S ⊆ A[l_i:r_i] such that sum(S) % D == 0 and |S| = N

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 每个子区间 [l, r] 只能选择恰好 N 个元素（每个团队选择一个成员）
constraints.formal: ∀ i ∈ [1, M], |S| = N where S ⊆ A[l_i:r_i]
